Summary: Static Light in Sky - Disappeared after a short time.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was mounting antennas with my father and I saw to a far distance, as night approached, a static light that almost resembled a star. It was too bright and bigger than the usual star size (from what we can see here). The light stood completely static for about 20 min. and when I decided to look again it was completely gone. It had not moved anywhere as we were on a rooftop and we had a clear view of the horizon. It was static and then vanished. I believe this was a sighting (and my first one - that I recall).
